Title: A Moment of Reflection
Description:
I do not understand what would drive Turi Flickerflame and her band of mages to attempt what they have done here today. But I do understand the pain of losing family. I understand the fear and regret that follows you wherever you go.

I have much to think about. I imagine Kalecgos has much yet to do in the Dragon Isles--return there with him. I will follow soon... I need some time to think upon what happened here today.
ObjectivesText: Return to Kalecgos in the Azure Span.

Objectives.Text: Take the portal to Kalec in the Azure Archives
